p: In a similar article, Jin, Zhao, Huang, Xu, and Shang (2012), report that the root of Angelica sinensis (Oliv.) Diels, well-known Chinese herb properties herbal-medicines, has been used for millennia as a tonic, hematopoietic agent and anti-inflammatory. Modern phytochemical and pharmacological studies, conducted with the herb show that polysaccharide is one of the main active ingredients and responsible for several important biological activities, such as hematopoiesis, immunomodulation, antitumor, antioxidant, radioprotection, and hypoglycemic activity.
